Sentencas: In a power grid with significant components of distributed generation and insufficient spinning reserve, the quality of delivered power may not meet the requirements of advanced manufacturing.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell architecture and system design for secure power on an unstable grid

Sentencas: A system design for power quality security which uses solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology is described.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell architecture and system design for secure power on an unstable grid

Sentencas: Critical parameters for system performance are continuous supply voltage at the nominal voltage and frequency.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell architecture and system design for secure power on an unstable grid

Sentencas: The grid chosen for this study has significant voltage fluctuations and periodic voltage drops and surges, including total power loss.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell architecture and system design for secure power on an unstable grid

Sentencas: A supply of methane from a sewer sludge digester is scrubbed Of CO2 and used for continuous standby operation, with excess stored to enable 8 h operation of an uninterruptible power supply (UPS).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell architecture and system design for secure power on an unstable grid

Sentencas: The system employs a modular, thermally coupled, SOFC architecture that includes steam reforming of the methane fuel, a rectifier, power controls, and control system.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell architecture and system design for secure power on an unstable grid

Sentencas: Continuous operation of a 125 kW tubular SOFC stack maintains operating temperature and steam for fuel reforming in a secondary SOFC stack, by exhausting through it before a gas turbine expands the exhaust to supply the plant air and fuel compression.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell architecture and system design for secure power on an unstable grid

Sentencas: Modelling of the energy balance of the system demonstrates the standby and full power operating modes.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell architecture and system design for secure power on an unstable grid

Sentencas: The system is sized at 250 kW to supply secure power for a manufacturing facility.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell architecture and system design for secure power on an unstable grid
